dct_title_s: Carte Physique et Politique de L'Afrique
dct_description_sm:
The shape appears to be accurate, including the geographical detail, with the exception
        of the center blank space. "The areas belonging to different native tribes are shown more
        accurately than in many other maps at this time"; Prime meridian through Paris.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
